email.label: Email
email.invalid_error: Please ensure the email entered is valid

password.label: Password
password.invalid_error: Password must be at least 8 characters and contain at least one letter and number

product_name.label: Product Name
product_name.invalid_error: Product name must be at least 4 and at most 20 characters

product_description.label: Product Description
product_description.invalid_error: Product description must be at least 8 and at most 80 characters

product_photo_url.label: Product Photo Url
product_photo_url.invalid_error: Please ensure the photo url entered is valid

stock_quantity.label: Stock Quantity
stock_quantity.invalid_error: Stock quantity must be at least 0 and at most 9999

barcode.label: Barcode
barcode.invalid_error: Barcode must be in EAN-13 format

delete_product.title: Delete Product
delete_product.content: This product will be permanently deleted.

unsaved_changes.title: Unsaved Changes
unsaved_changes.content: Are you sure you want to discard? Changes will be lost.

ongoing_stocktaking.title: Ongoing Stocktaking
ongoing_stocktaking.content: There is a stocktaking in progress. Do you want to continue?

complete_stocktaking.title: Complete Stocktaking
complete_stocktaking.content: Do you want to complete stocktaking? This transaction cannot be undone, stock quantities will be recorded.

stocktaking_known.content_overwrite: The product has already been added. You will overwrite the stock quantity.
stocktaking_known.content_add: Enter the stock quantity for the product.

stocktaking_unknown.title: Unknown Product
stocktaking_unknown.content: The scanned barcode does not belong to any product. Would you like to add a new product?

stocktaking_reset.title: Reset Stocktaking
stocktaking_reset.content: This transaction cannot be undone, stocktaking will be reseted.

add_edit_product.barcode_message_alreadyInProduct: Barcode has already been added to this product!
add_edit_product.barcode_message_alreadyInUse: Barcode is being used for another product!
